name: Settle It
tagline: Quick polls to settle small decisions
description: Settle It is a simple way to make quick polls and share them with a link. Type a question in one line, send the link to friends or family, and see the result as votes come in. It‚Äôs designed for everyday decisions like where to eat, when to meet, or what to do next. No accounts, no setup, no friction. Make a poll. Share the link. Decide.

name: Burner Note
tagline: Zero knowledge self destructing notes
description: Send private notes that automatically delete after reading. End-to-end AES-256 encryption in your browser. Zero-knowledge architecture means we can't read your messages. Free, open source, no tracking.

name: Pane
tagline: The AI that works directly in your spreadsheet's grid
description: The first agentic spreadsheet where AI edits cells and formulas with human-level precision.

name: Warbl
tagline: Boost engagement and grow your audience effortlessly on X
description: Generate perfect replies on X (Twitter) in one click. AI-powered Chrome extension with personalized voice profiles, smart web search, and image analysis.

name: SkreenPro
tagline: Screenshot Editing. Open Source. Free. Powerful.
description: Capture screenshots, annotate with powerful tools, and share instantly. The beautiful, free, and open source screenshot tool built for creators and developers.

name: HtmlDrag
tagline: A freeform canvas for any HTML (no grids, no wireframes)
description: A freeform canvas to edit any HTML without grid constraints. Import a URL, upload any HTML file, or paste code ‚Äî then drag elements anywhere and double‚Äëclick to edit text. No rigid structures, just pure creative freedom for all your web content. Share your work via a public link or download your edits instantly.

name: VPN Peek
tagline: See if your VPN is actually working from your menu bar
description: VPN Peek monitors your VPN status from the macOS menu bar and detects DNS & IPv6 leaks. Get instant notifications when your VPN drops or your traffic leaks. Works with any VPN provider. $3.99, pay once.

name: Tangle
tagline: Life on purpose. A Tangle  app for living with intention.
description: Grow into who you want to become‚Äîset everyday intentions, get support from your people, and watch your story unfold. Tangle is a new kind of social network, designed for intentional living.

name: JusBook - Scheduler
tagline: Book-Manage-Relax
description: Most scheduling tools stop at booking meetings. JusBook is built as a Scheduling OS. What‚Äôs new in this launch: ü§ñ Tara AI ‚Äî an intelligent assistant to manage scheduling workflows üìö Catalogs ‚Äî organize and publish multiple services from a single link üë• 1-Many Bookings ‚Äî host group sessions, workshops, and events üìÜ Google & Microsoft Calendar Sync ‚Äî real-time availability, zero conflicts üè¢ Professional & Enterprise plans ‚Äî built for teams, roles, and scale

name: AI Thumbnail
tagline: Turn any thumbnail into your own, instantly
description: Create viral YouTube thumbnails with AI in seconds. Upload a thumbnail you like, add your own text and face, and generate high-contrast, click-ready designs. Built for creators who care about CTR, not design tools. Two unique variations per generation. No design skills needed.

name: Expense6
tagline: Organize finances with Workzones. Invoice, track & share.
description: Stop mixing your finances. Expense6 uses Workzones to separate money by project, business, or family. Ideally suited for freelancers, property investors, and side hustlers. Features include professional invoicing, instant receipt scanning, and secure accountant sharing. We never ask for your bank login details so your data stays private. Take control of your money and start 2026 organized.

name: ChatRealtor v2
tagline: Turn Zillow listing into viral real estate videos in 2 mins
description: Turn Any Zillow Listing into a Viral Real Estate Video in 2 Minutes ‚Äî One Click, Zero Editing. Just paste a Zillow URL or Upload Property Images, select 5‚Äì10 photos, and get a ready-to-post video in under 60 seconds ‚Äî no editing, no software, no experience required. Perfect for agents and Airbnb hosts who need listing videos fast‚Äîwith zero editing.

name: Snaplife AI
tagline: Turn any photo into a talking video!
description: Snaplife AI is a fun utility that brings your photos to life with talking videos. Make your grandparents talk, give voice to baby photos, or create hilarious videos of friends saying funny things. Upload any photo and our AI generates natural scripts and voices in under 60 seconds. Perfect for birthday surprises, pet videos, memorial tributes, and 100+ other ways to make memories move. Start with 3 free videos‚Äîno credit card required.

name: Press Release Library
tagline: Press release examples and templates for every announcement
description: Press Release Examples Library helps founders and marketers generate realistic press release examples by announcement type, such as funding, product launches, and company updates. Instead of generic templates, you get newsroom-style examples and editable structures you can copy and adapt for your own announcement. Built to save time and remove guesswork from writing press releases.

name: Elementy
tagline: Supercharging UI creation with AI
description: Elementy is a lightweight, modern AI tool for creators who want to build UI's without friction. No clutter, no overengineering, just the essentials to bring ideas to life.

name: Storybound
tagline: AI companion that teaches kids how to write stories
description: Storybound helps kids learn to write and illustrate original stories through guided conversation. AI supports the creative process step by step, while kids remain the authors‚Äîbuilding confidence, creativity, and storytelling skills as they go.

name: PayChasers
tagline: Stop chasing clients for payment. Automate it.
description: PayChasers helps freelancers and small teams stop chasing invoices. It automatically sends polite, context-aware follow-ups when payments are overdue, so you don‚Äôt have to send awkward reminders. You stay in control with manual actions or switch to autopilot when you want. Get paid on time without damaging client relationships.

name: Nyooon Pixel
tagline: Draw pixel art and play with physics simulations
description: Nyoon Pixel is a creative platform to draw pixel art and play with physics simulations. Create and share your art, and explore other creators' works. Place dots and watch them move. Draw, drop, shake, and take home icons or GIFs. Remix others and get inspired in the gallery. Make your favorites move.

name: FocusNinja
tagline: What did you ship this week?
description: A great coach asks hard questions every week. AI remembers every answer and spots the patterns. Finally, both, in a system that won't let you drift. Imagine December 31st. 52 boxes staring back at you. Will you see a year you shipped, or a year you drifted?

name: LeadLooking - Find Your Reddit Customers
tagline: Find Customers From Reddit on Autopilot
description: Find high-intent Reddit leads everyday. Track keywords, get instant notifications and join conversations where people need exactly what you offer.
